definition: a staff/a rod/cane/walking stick/to flog with a stick (old)

sentences.english: The staff with the snake has long been a symbol of medicine and the medical profession.
sentences.chinese: 長期以來，由蛇盤繞的權杖系醫學及醫學界的標誌。

sentences.english: Once staff is trained, most of the costs of the organizational transformation are absorbed.
sentences.chinese: 一旦權杖被訓練，組織轉形的大部份費用被吸收。

sentences.english: Every French soldier carries a marshal's baton in his knapsack.
sentences.chinese: 每個法國士兵的揹包裏都裝着一隻元帥的權杖。

sentences.english: Fu Manchu seeks the sceptre of Ghenghis Khan so he can rule Asia.
sentences.chinese: 傅滿洲尋求成吉思汗的權杖，所以他能統治亞洲。

sentences.english: The grim beadle now made a gesture with his staff.
sentences.chinese: 獄吏此時用權杖做了個姿勢。

sentences.english: Reduced cast time of Scepter of Destruction from 5 seconds to 3.
sentences.chinese: 毀滅權杖的衝擊波的施放時間從5秒降至3秒。

sentences.english: Retrieves the security token that matches the specified key identifier clause.
sentences.chinese: 擷取與指定之金鑰識別碼子句相符的安全性權杖。

sentences.english: She puts a bamboo flute before chest and be like to hold the crosier in ancient Egyptian queen hand.
sentences.chinese: 她將笛子放在胸前，就像握着古埃及女王手中的權杖。

sentences.english: Drake's Breath is an elementalist scepter cone skill.
sentences.chinese: 龍息是元素使權杖錐形技能。

sentences.english: Sceptres are carried by kings as a sign of power.
sentences.chinese: 國王所持的權杖是權力的象徵。

sentences.english: It clothes you with self-honor, and puts a scepter in your hands.
sentences.chinese: 它爲你披戴自尊的錦袍，把權杖放在你的手中。

sentences.english: It shows two staves or two arms or both lungs. One feels parallel polarity issuse.
sentences.chinese: 它的圖案是兩個權杖，或兩隻手臂或兩個肺葉。

sentences.english: After Li Bingzhe dies, li Jianxi of 45 years old has received father's crosier .
sentences.chinese: 李秉哲去世後，45歲的李健熙接過父親的權杖。

sentences.english: Friendship are the true sceptres of princes .
sentences.chinese: 朋友是君主正真的權杖。

sentences.english: The emblem consists of the United Nations symbol surmounted by a staff with a snake coiling round it.
sentences.chinese: 該會徽由一條蛇盤繞的權杖所覆蓋的聯合國標誌組成。

sentences.english: A scepter is the attribute of power.

definition: ushering in wealth and prosperity (idiom and traditional greeting, esp. at New Year); We wish you wealth and success!
to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)
a legendary tree that sheds coins when shaken/a source of easy money (idiom)
